com.softwaresmithy
Class DownloadDataTask

java.lang.Object
  
      com.softwaresmithy.DownloadDataTask

public class DownloadDataTask
extends

Capsule class to perform network operations to gather metadata in a background thread, and off the android UI thread. Current operations are 1) gathering text metadata 2) save to the database 3) retrieve and save thumbnail image 4) retrieve status from library (and update database row)

Author:
SZY4ZQ
